attributes.action: Bring in a Fair Rent Act for private tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Act should impose limits on the amount of rent chargeable by Landlord inthe private sector in line with those in the public sector.
This will make housing more affordable and reduce the burden on housing benefit budgets.
This is especially relevant in times of recession and for those young people seeking to leave home who have restrictions placed on their ability to receive state support for housing costs.
